content: प्रसभः Force, violence, impetuosity; प्रसभोद्धृतारिः <ls>R. 2. 30.</ls> --भं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Violently, forcibly, perforce; इंद्रियाणि प्रमाथीनि हरंति प्रसभं मनः <ls>Bg. 2. 60</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 332.</ls> {@--2@} Very much, exceedingly; तवास्मि गीतरागेण हारिणा प्रसभं हृतः <ls>Ś. 1. 5</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 25.</ls> {@--3@} Importunately; <ls>Bg. 11. 41.</ls>
